mapper.select: SELECT ( SELECT DISTINCT pol.pc_num FROM sodr_po_line pol WHERE pol.po_line_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT l.from_po_line_id FROM sinv_rcv_trx_line l WHERE l.rcv_trx_header_id = h.rcv_trx_header_id ) ) pc_num, ( SELECT sph.pc_name FROM spcm_pc_header sph WHERE sph.pc_num = ( SELECT DISTINCT pol.pc_num FROM sodr_po_line pol WHERE pol.po_line_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT l.from_po_line_id FROM sinv_rcv_trx_line l WHERE l.rcv_trx_header_id = h.rcv_trx_header_id ) ) ) pc_name, h.received_by AS acceptor_name, concat( concat( h.trx_num, ( SELECT sph.pc_name FROM spcm_pc_header sph WHERE sph.pc_num = ( SELECT DISTINCT pol.pc_num FROM sodr_po_line pol WHERE pol.po_line_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT l.from_po_line_id FROM sinv_rcv_trx_line l WHERE l.rcv_trx_header_id = h.rcv_trx_header_id ) ) ) ), h.received_by ) FSubject, h.trx_num, h.company_name company_id, h.supplier_company_name supplier_company_id, h.attribute_varchar8 accept_list_type, date_format( h.creation_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s' ) accept_date, h.remark accept_details FROM sinv_rcv_trx_header h WHERE h.tenant_id = #{organizationId} AND h.rcv_trx_header_id = #{acceptListHeaderId}
